snippet: Former Nigerian President Olusegun Obasanjo says he will "consider withdrawing" from the country's governing party until it gets rid of a top financier wanted in the U.S. for alleged drug trafficking....

headline.print_headline: Obasanjo Threatens to Withdraw From Nigerian Party
headline.main: Obasanjo Threatens to Withdraw From Nigerian Party

lead_paragraph: Former Nigerian President Olusegun Obasanjo says he will "consider withdrawing" from the country's governing party until it gets rid of a top financier wanted in the U.S. for alleged drug trafficking.
